com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer

Class SpinYieldAndParkBarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.BarrierBase
      • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.SpinBarrier
        • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.SpinAndYieldBarrier
          • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.SpinYieldAndParkBarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Barrier

    public class SpinYieldAndParkBarrier
extends SpinAndYieldBarrier
    Slightly less resource intensive version of the SpinAndYieldBarrier.

    The behavior is the same as the parent class (i.e. spins until the yield threshold, then yields), except that once the spin count reaches 0 the calling thread is parked on each invocation of nonBlockingPause(int).

    • Method Detail

      • nonBlockingPause

        protected int nonBlockingPause(int spinCount)
        Description copied from class: SpinBarrier
        Sub-class hook to provide less resource intensive behavior.

        This method is guaranteed to be called exactly once every time the required sequence number is not available.

        Overrides:
        nonBlockingPause in class SpinAndYieldBarrier
        Parameters:
        spinCount - The current spin count. This will be whatever was returned the last time this method was invoked (or the initial value on the first invocation).
        Returns:
        The new spin count.
